Example: Computing a bond value using forward rates
The current 1-year rate, S, is 4%, the 1-year forward rate for lending from time = 1
to time = 2 is lyly = 5%, and the 1-year forward rate for lending from time = 2 to
time = 3 is 2yly = 6%. Value a 3-year annual-pay bond with a 5% coupon and a par
value of $1,000.
